utterances.speaker: Male
utterances.text: Yeah.

utterances.speaker: Male
utterances.text: Yeah and they said get whatever you want and...

utterances.speaker: Female
utterances.text: Mmmm some miso soup.

utterances.speaker: Male
utterances.text: Some miso soup.  You can get whatever.  You can get a vat full of miso soup.  God.

utterances.speaker: Female
utterances.text: Ah man.

utterances.speaker: Male
utterances.text: This is going to be so great.  I have so many great ideas.

utterances.speaker: Female
utterances.text: Yeah. Did you...I mean do send in like how long after you send in your application did you hear?

utterances.speaker: Male
utterances.text: to start off.

utterances.speaker: Male
utterances.text: It took them, oh man, it took them like, I mean what it's like April now and any letters that come in April are usually the rejection letters so I was just like...

utterances.speaker: Female
utterances.text: You were like...
How's your vacation to Europe?

It was amazing. I had such a great time exploring all these different countries. I visited France, Italy, and Spain, and every place had its own charm. The food was incredible, and I took a lot of pictures. I can't wait to share them with you.
Oh, so you've been to France. Which city have you been to?
I spent most of my time in Paris, which was absolutely beautiful. I got to see the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre, and just walked around the city and enjoyed all the little cafes. It was magical.
Oh, really? Last time I went to Paris, it was too crowded, too many tourists. So I didn't have really good time there. It was too crowded.

I totally get that. It can get pretty crowded, especially around the big landmarks in the summer. I tried to go to a few quieter neighborhoods and just enjoy some of the local spots, and that definitely helped a bit. But yeah, I can understand how that can be a bit overwhelming.

utterances.speaker: G00000435
utterances.text: 什么别都往外瞎跑什么的，自己在外注意注意点儿什么我妈就说这种。 | 嗯就感觉好了吧就。 | 和他们关系就又变好了。

utterances.speaker: G00000436
utterances.text: 啊我和他们关系就。[+] | 忽冷忽热。

utterances.speaker: G00000435
utterances.text: 忽冷忽热。[+]

utterances.speaker: G00000436
utterances.text: 热也不会热到。 | 热就是很平常的地步就是这就算热了就冷就是冷是一直冷。[+]

utterances.speaker: G00000435
utterances.text: 嗯。

utterances.speaker: G00000436
utterances.text: 我家比较挺什么吧因为我爸是北方人，我妈是南方人，他们都五十多岁啦。[+]

utterances.speaker: G00000435
utterances.text: 妈妈是南方的。[+]
我上周末考的那个托福出分了
这次就考的也很烂
感觉又浪费了两千块钱
别灰心
托福有时候确实挺难的
不过每一次考试
都是一次经验的积累
下次你就知道
哪些地方要多注意一点
而且你也可以调整一下学习方法
说不定下次就能考得更好
主要是考试的时候非常搞心态
在考口语的时候
旁边的人一直在敲桌子
都不知道是什么毛病
这种小插曲还真是挺让人分心的
确实很影响心态
不过你下次就稍微做好心理准备
尽量专注在自己的考试上
让自己放轻松一点
可能就会好很多
